synopsis: Daiya Tsuwabuki is a boy in junior high who is known as the town liar. He claims that five years ago, he was saved by a large mechanical dragon when he and his father were attacked at sea by mechanical beasts.
Daiya meets the crew of Daiku-Maryu, which includes Lulu, Gaiking’s supporter; Captain Garis; Vice Captain Rosa; Shizuka and Daimon in charge of the engine room; and Puria, the pilot of Stinger.

title.jp: The Start of a Journey… Farewell, Mom!

synopsis: Daiya learns that for their fight against the Darius Army, they have to go to the other world at the core of the earth, and Captain Garis gives Daiya some time to go say goodbye to his mother.
In order to return to Darius, Daiku-Maryu must go through Death Cross Point and mend the subspace in order to prevent the enemy from going to the surface.
Daiku-Maryu arrives in Darius and goes to a regional city called Paltegona to stock up on food and supplies. Captain Garis orders Rosa to take Daiya and Puria into town with her.

title.jp: What Will We Do?! Launching is Impossible!

synopsis: Captain Garis temporarily assigns Daiya to five sections on the ship to decide which section he will join permanently.
Daiku-Maryu docks at a tropical island where the crewmembers enjoy some beach time.

title.jp: The Smallest Strongest Enemy in History

synopsis: On their way to their fort in Ohmazan, Daiku-Maryu takes a break in the Kanalups Mountains.
One day on their way to the Ohmazan fort, Daiku-Maryu is attacked by a giant turtle beast, Domega.

title.jp: Lulu's Crisis! Terror on the Sea Floor

synopsis: As Daiku-Maryu approaches the dark continent of Arkholand where the Darius Army headquarters is located, Lulu starts having nightmares about her childhood and the black flame.
One day, Grotecter warships of Northern General Noza fly past Daiku-Maryu. They are on their way to create another Death Cross Point, the hole that connects to the world above the surface.
While Grotecter warships are forming Death Cross Point, Noza challenges Daiya to another duel. Daiya goes against Garis’s order and accepts, even though he is daunted by Noza’s strength.
After the battle with Noza, the captain and Daiya fall ill, and Daiku-Maryu, as well as Stinger and Serpent, are badly damaged.

title.jp: Amusement Park Battle! Rosa's Day Off

synopsis: After the battle with Noza, Daiku-Maryu and Gaiking get repaired in a new fort built by rebel forces in an abandoned desert city.

title.jp: A Dangerous Fugitive! A Clue about Father!

synopsis: During a battle in the air, a civilian airplane asks Daiku-Maryu for help, and Lulu agrees to let him come onboard.
One day, Lee goes on a recon mission and saves Vestarnu, who is being attacked by droid soldiers at Proist’s secret quarry. She gets gunpowder in her eyes and becomes temporarily blinded.

title.jp: Friend or Foe?! A Dangerous New Force

synopsis: Daiku-Maryu arrives in the lawless city of Zangyle. Captain Garis tells Rosa to oversee the ship while he goes into town.

title.jp: Super Weapon! The Trump Card of Darius

synopsis: Dick attacks Gaiking to get to the enemy, and while the enemy falters, Gaiking counterattacks. Although they managed to get through the battle, everybody is furious at Dick for his dangerous tactic.
Powerless against the enhanced Steel Beast, Stinger, Serpent, and Killjaguar retreat to Daiku-Maryu for the time being, but they learn that Proist ordered a public execution for Gaiking.
One day on a deserted island, Garis proposes a race to go find Windarium, a mineral ore that can counterattack Darius’s ice beam.
Lulu starts reading people’s fortunes when one day, she predicts that Bry, the rebel fighter and Daiku-Maryu supporter, will reunite with someone special.
One day, Yanma, Haccho, and Booby, in an attempt to prove their usefulness, force themselves onto Gaiking with Daiya.
One day, Shizuka looks frantically for Dr. Sakon, but he is nowhere on the ship. Shizuka becomes furious and takes off on Stinger to go find him.

title.jp: Pink Hippos that Trot the Battlefield!

synopsis: The Daiku-Maryu crewmembers start seeing pink hippos everywhere on the ship. Dr. Franklin informs them that they are hallucinations from Limitation Syndrome, which occurs when people feel stressed.
The Daiku-Maryu idol contest enters the final round in which the candidates become an idol for the deciding popularity vote. They each make a performance that will attract the crew’s attention.
Concerned about Captain Garis’s odd behavior, Dick and Daiya take off on a surveillance mission and land in a ruined city. There, Dick runs into Proist, and Daiya into Noza.
Daiku-Maryu gets attacked by Vestarnu and her Steel Beasts, and Lulu gets kidnapped. To get her back, Proist tells Garis to come alone to the place where he hid Tenku-Maryu.
Dick intervenes just in time and takes the blade in the shoulder instead of Garis. Lulu gets taken away again by Proist, and Garis and the others return to Daiku-Maryu.
Garis must be taken to a rebel fort to get treated, but in order to get there, Daiku-Maryu must fly through a dangerous minefield.
Daiku-Maryu docks by a beautiful lake, and the crewmembers enjoy a moment of relaxation. There, Daiya compares his friend Naoto and his video games to their battle against Raiking and Vulking.
Lee infiltrates Daichi-Maryu and finds a way to undo the brainwash on Vestarnu. He tells Daiya to do the same thing to Noza.

title.jp: The Two of Us in a Battle on the Surface!!

synopsis: Daiya and Puria are blown away to the surface on Gaiking’s torso and Superior Stinger. They find themselves on a deserted island but don’t have enough flame in their machines to fly anywhere.
When Kaikink is fixed, more Steel Beasts attack the cargo ship. Then suddenly, Killjaguar and Daiku-Maryu show up and join the battle.
Daiku-Maryu heads toward the coast of California looking for the remnants of the Super Maryu.
Daiku-Maryu returns to Darius with a special missile that creates Death Cross Point. They join up with Lee and Vestarnu on Daichi-Maryu and head toward Darius Capital.
Emperor Darius contacts Lulu and asks her to stop Proist. He asks for a meeting and says he will bring Daiya’s father with him. Lulu thinks that it may be a trap, but decides to meet him anyway.
Proist puts Daiya’s dad in a pod inside the Super Maryu Beast, Final Dvorzak. The pod is connected to the beast’s heart with cords.
Lulu is devastated over Dick’s death and refuses to command the ship until Rosa makes her come to her senses. Daiya returns to Daiku-Maryu for refueling and have a tearful reunion with his father.
Proist comes back to life after her four generals sacrifice their lives for her.
